titles.title: A bill to award a Congressional gold medal to Rabbi Menachem Mendal Schneerson.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14113)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14786)

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 10/4/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the President to present, on behalf of the Congress, to the Lubavitcher rebbe, Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson, a gold medal in recognition of his outstanding and enduring contributions toward world education, morality, and acts of charity. States that no appropriations are authorized to implement this Act. Declares that the medals struck pursuant to this Act are national medals.
